name: gear-up
effect: Raises the Attack and Special Attack of all friendly Pokémon with plus or minus by one stage.

flavor_text_entries.sun-moon:
The user engages its gears to raise the Attack and
Sp. Atk stats of ally Pokémon with the Plus or
Minus Ability.
flavor_text_entries.ultra-sun-ultra-moon:
The user engages its gears to raise the Attack and
Sp. Atk stats of ally Pokémon with the Plus or
Minus Ability.

Sp. Atk stats of ally Pokémon with the Plus or
Minus Ability.
